phase.text: Hi! The Bin is completely frozen, this is the best day ever!

userResponse.option: Hmm. That's not right - I should talk to Gam about this!
I'm busy exploring! Seeya later Bing!

phase.text: Hey! Check out all this FREEZING snow! Isn't it amazing?

userResponse.option: Not really Bing, the whole Bin is frozen! Do you know how we can fix your out of control snow machine?

phase.text: The WHOLE Bin is frozen? Aw, well... my snow machine is in the frozen cabin. I'll give you the instruction manual only if you help me find my tree decorations!

userResponse.option: So if I help find your decorations, you'll promise to give me the instruction manual?
Actually, I'm with you on this one - let it snow!

phase.text: I promise. Here's the list of decorations I need for my Christmas tree!
The Christmas Tree is still looking a bit bare...
The Christmas tree looks Bin-credible! Thanks!

userResponse.option: No problemo! So have you got the instruction manual for the Snow Machine?

phase.text: Here you go, this is the Snow Machine's instruction manual! Oh and it's a bit... not exactly stuck together.

userResponse.option: *sigh* Looks like I better put it together again! Thanks a lot, Bing...

phase.text: You need to put it together again to read it.
Wow, you actually fixed the manual? Now you can turn the pages to find more information on the snow machine!
I didn't want to admit it, but that was TOO much snow, even for me! Thanks!

userResponse.option: Enjoy your Christmas today Bing! And tomorrow. And the day after tomorrow. And the day after the day after tomorrow. And...

phase.text: This bauble isn't the right colour!

userResponse.option: That's not weird at all! Oh look is that the time? I have to go... Bye!
